name: Ghosted: A Story About Modern Dating
name_original: Ghosted: A Story About Modern Dating
description:
"Ghosted" is a short, choice-based game exploring one of the biggest and most frustrating pitfalls of dating in the digital age - namely, dealing with the sudden silence that sometimes comes after what you thought was a successful date. 

Could it have been something you said?

Four possible endings.

===

Original source code from "Coming Out Simulator 2014" by Nicky Case.
